predicate.note: Frames file for 'degenerate' based on sentences in wsj and automatic expansion via verbnet.

role.descr: causer of something becoming bad (rarely or never occuring)

example.name: usually with just end point
example.text: Demonstrations are particularly apt *trace* to degenerate into criminal conduct when they leave the site of the grievance and become mobile.

example.name: explicit start state
example.text: Customers degenerate from borrowers to savers/investors.
